recoursemech: Compliance with legal or regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution (i.e. the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)). Any remedies provided by the dispute resolution body should be that the effects of noncompliance are reversed or corrected by Fenestra, in so far as feasible, and that future processing by Fenestra will be in conformity with these Principles and, where appropriate, that processing of the personal data of the individual who has brought the complaint will cease.
